Weapon.Name: Void Edge Dagger
Weapon.Description: A dagger that slices through the fabric of reality, leaving wounds that are slow to heal.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Teleport behind the enemy for a critical strike
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As you strike, the air shivers, and you're already behind your foe.

Weapon.Name: Starforge Staff
Weapon.Description: A majestic staff that channels the cosmic energy of distant stars.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Summons a meteor shower on the battlefield
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The sky darkens as meteors rain down upon your enemies.

Weapon.Name: Whisperwind Bow
Weapon.Description: A bow that emits a soft hum when drawn, its arrows strike as swiftly as the wind.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Arrow splits into three, hitting multiple targets
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The whisper of your arrow becomes a tempest, engulfing your foes.
